description:
The main issue here is that we're always picking the first 'public' (or 'private') address. They are unordered so they could be either IPv4 or IPv6 addresses. So, we need to add an option that specifies which one to pick.

For completeness, also adding an option to pick which port number to use as well.
title: Support --ipv6 and --port in python-novaclient ssh command
